<TD style="BORDER-RIGHT: windowtext 1pt solid; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt; BORDER-TOP: #d4d0c8; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; BORDER-LEFT: windowtext 1pt solid; WIDTH: 41.4pt; PADDING-TOP: 0in; BORDER-BOTTOM: windowtext 1pt solid; BACKGROUND-COLOR: transparent; mso-border-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; mso-border-top-alt: solid windowtext .5pt" vAlign=top width=55>
<P class=MsoNormal style="TEXT-JUSTIFY: inter-ideograph; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">1.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></P></TD>
<TD style="BORDER-RIGHT: windowtext 1pt solid; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt; BORDER-TOP: #d4d0c8; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; BORDER-LEFT: #d4d0c8; WIDTH: 441pt; PADDING-TOP: 0in; BORDER-BOTTOM: windowtext 1pt solid; BACKGROUND-COLOR: transparent; mso-border-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; mso-border-left-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; mso-border-top-alt: solid windowtext .5pt" vAlign=top width=588>
<P class=MsoTitle style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left" align=left><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt"><STRONG><U>500 MHz Nuclear Magnetic Resonance Spectrometer (as per specifications below)<o:p></o:p></U></STRONG></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt"><o:p><SPAN style="TEXT-DECORATION: none"><STRONG><U>&nbsp;</U></STRONG></SPAN></o:p></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><B><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">1.<SPAN style="mso-spacerun: yes">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </SPAN><U>500 MHz Spectrometer system </U></SPAN></B><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></SPAN></P>
<UL style="MARGIN-TOP: 0in" type=disc>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l4 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">Actively shielded standard bore superconducting magnet with minimal footprint and maximum cryo-fill intervals.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l4 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">Operating field 11.75 Tesla, corresponding to 500 MHz <SUP>1</SUP>H NMR frequency.<SPAN style="mso-spacerun: yes">&nbsp; </SPAN><o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l4 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">Set of cryo-shims and room temperature shims; gradient shimming capability.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l4 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">Deuterium lock; additional lock channel for HR <SUP>2</SUP>H / <SUP>6</SUP>Li NMR.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="TEXT-JUSTIFY: inter-ideograph; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l4 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">Modern digital architecture including two broadband frequency channels with fast amplitude/phase/frequency switching capability, an array of transmitters, digital lock, digital receiver, digital signal processing.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l4 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">Programmable RF pulse shaping capability; versatile pulse programmer. <o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l4 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">Variable temperature controller.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l4 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">Magnet height and minimum ceiling height of NMR room should be specified.<U><o:p></o:p></U></SPAN></LI></UL>
<P class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">2.<SPAN style="mso-spacerun: yes">&nbsp;&nbsp; </SPAN><B><U>PC Workstation</U></B><o:p></o:p></SPAN></P>
<UL style="MARGIN-TOP: 0in" type=disc>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l2 level1 lfo2; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">With latest hardware configuration including excellent graphics, RAM, HDD, CD-RW/DVD-R+RW, printer, ports and monitor specifications.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l2 level1 lfo2; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">Latest Windows / Linux based operating system.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l2 level1 lfo2; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">Latest NMR data acquisition, processing and simulation software with multi-user or campus license. <o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; mso-list: l2 level1 lfo2; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">Add-on software for data-based NMR spectral interpreter support and NMR data library.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI></UL>
<P class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><B style="mso-bidi-font-weight: normal"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">3.<SPAN style="mso-spacerun: yes">&nbsp;&nbsp; </SPAN>Helium transfer line</SPAN></B><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt"><o:p></o:p></SPAN></P>

<P class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: list .5in"><B><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">5.<SPAN style="mso-spacerun: yes">&nbsp;&nbsp; </SPAN><U>Probeheads</U><o:p></o:p></SPAN></B></P>
<P class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0.25in"><B><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">a). Solution state Probeheads with variable temperature facility.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></B></P>

<P class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 73.95pt; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; mso-list: l3 level2 lfo3; tab-stops: list 73.95pt"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: Wingdings; mso-fareast-font-family: Wingdings; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: Wingdings"><SPAN style="mso-list: Ignore">v<SPAN style="FONT: 7pt 'Times New Roman'">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </SPAN></SPAN></SPAN><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">HR NMR kit (standard samples, 5 mm sample tubes, caps, etc.)<o:p></o:p></SPAN></P>

<H2 style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left" align=left><FONT face="Arial Narrow"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; mso-bidi-font-size: 10.0pt">7.<SPAN style="mso-spacerun: yes">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </SPAN>Compressor/Drier :<SPAN style="mso-spacerun: yes">&nbsp; </SPAN></SPAN><SPAN style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 11pt; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold; mso-bidi-font-size: 10.0pt">Suitable for both solid state and solution state NMR experiments, besides <o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></H2>
<H2 style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: left" align=left><FONT face="Arial Narrow"><SPAN style="FONT-WEIGHT: normal; FONT-SIZE: 11pt; mso-bidi-font-weight: bold; mso-bidi-font-size: 10.0pt">pneumatic sample load / eject.</SPAN><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; mso-bidi-font-size: 10.0pt"><o:p></o:p></SPAN></FONT></H2>

<P class=MsoBodyText style="TEXT-JUSTIFY: inter-ideograph; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify"><B style="mso-bidi-font-weight: normal"><U><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-style: italic; mso-bidi-font-size: 10.0pt">BIDDING SYSTEM<o:p></o:p></SPAN></U></B></P>
<P class=MsoBodyText style="TEXT-JUSTIFY: inter-ideograph; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-style: italic; mso-bidi-font-size: 10.0pt">Your quotation should be in the form of Two Bid system i.e. (1) Technical Bid, and (2) Commercial Bid.<SPAN style="mso-spacerun: yes">&nbsp; </SPAN>Both the bids should be placed in separate closed covers.<SPAN style="mso-spacerun: yes">&nbsp; </SPAN>Each of the cover should indicate whether it is “Technical” or “Commercial” bid, as the case may be.<SPAN style="mso-spacerun: yes">&nbsp; </SPAN>Both these sealed covers should be packed in a single cover and addressed to Director, Central Salt &amp; Marine Chemicals Research Institute, Bhavnagar 364002, Gujarat (India) and also indicate on top of the cover (1) Our enquiry No. (2) Due date of opening.</SPAN><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 10.0pt"><o:p></o:p></SPAN></P></TD></TR>
<TR>
<TD style="BORDER-RIGHT: windowtext 1pt solid; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt; BORDER-TOP: #d4d0c8; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; BORDER-LEFT: windowtext 1pt solid; WIDTH: 7.45in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; BORDER-BOTTOM: windowtext 1pt solid; BACKGROUND-COLOR: transparent; mso-border-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; mso-border-top-alt: solid windowtext .5pt" vAlign=top width=715>
<P class=MsoBodyText style="TEXT-JUSTIFY: inter-ideograph; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify"><B style="mso-bidi-font-weight: normal"><U><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-style: italic; mso-bidi-font-size: 10.0pt">TECHNICAL BID SHOULD CONTAIN<o:p></o:p></SPAN></U></B></P>
<P class=MsoBodyText style="TEXT-JUSTIFY: inter-ideograph; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-style: italic; mso-bidi-font-size: 10.0pt">The “Technical” bid should contain detailed specification with make, model number along with required essential/optional accessories, spares, country of origin, etc., supported by technical literature/leaflets/ photographs/engineering drawings etc. (2 copies) AND the following:<o:p></o:p></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoNormal style="TEXT-JUSTIFY: inter-ideograph; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 1in; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5in; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l6 level3 lfo1; tab-stops: list 1.0in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Arial Narrow'"><SPAN style="mso-list: Ignore">1.1.1<SPAN style="FONT: 7pt 'Times New Roman'">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </SPAN></SPAN></SPAN><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">A brief profile of the company<o:p></o:p></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoNormal style="TEXT-JUSTIFY: inter-ideograph; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 1in; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5in; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l6 level3 lfo1; tab-stops: list 1.0in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Arial Narrow'"><SPAN style="mso-list: Ignore">1.1.2<SPAN style="FONT: 7pt 'Times New Roman'">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </SPAN></SPAN></SPAN><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">DGS&amp;D Registration Certificate, if any may be attached.<SPAN style="mso-spacerun: yes">&nbsp; </SPAN><o:p></o:p></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoNormal style="TEXT-JUSTIFY: inter-ideograph; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 1.5in; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5in; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l6 level4 lfo1; tab-stops: list 1.25in 1.5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Arial Narrow'"><SPAN style="mso-list: Ignore">1.1.2.1<SPAN style="FONT: 7pt 'Times New Roman'">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </SPAN></SPAN></SPAN><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">Secondly, if the items are available under DGS&amp;D rate contract, rates may quoted as approved by DGS&amp;D and copy of rate contract attached.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoNormal style="TEXT-JUSTIFY: inter-ideograph; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 1in; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5in; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l6 level3 lfo1; tab-stops: list 1.0in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Arial Narrow'"><SPAN style="mso-list: Ignore">1.1.3<SPAN style="FONT: 7pt 'Times New Roman'">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </SPAN></SPAN></SPAN><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">List of customers in </SPAN><?xml:namespace prefix = st1 ns = "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:smarttags" /><st1:country-region><st1:place><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">India</SPAN></st1:place></st1:country-region><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt"> with supporting documents like purchase orders [erasing out the rate of supply] including appreciation letters, if any.<SPAN style="mso-spacerun: yes">&nbsp; </SPAN><B style="mso-bidi-font-weight: normal">Highlight supplies to CSIR Labs in particular.</B><o:p></o:p></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoNormal style="TEXT-JUSTIFY: inter-ideograph; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 1in; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5in; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l6 level3 lfo1; tab-stops: list 1.0in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Arial Narrow'"><SPAN style="mso-list: Ignore">1.1.4<SPAN style="FONT: 7pt 'Times New Roman'">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </SPAN></SPAN></SPAN><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">Proforma Information Sheet duly filled and signed (Annexure-A)<o:p></o:p></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoNormal style="TEXT-JUSTIFY: inter-ideograph; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 1in; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5in; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l6 level3 lfo1; tab-stops: list 1.0in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Arial Narrow'"><SPAN style="mso-list: Ignore">1.1.5<SPAN style="FONT: 7pt 'Times New Roman'">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </SPAN></SPAN></SPAN><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">Point-wise Technical Compliance list vis-à-vis specifications of the item.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoNormal style="TEXT-JUSTIFY: inter-ideograph; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 1in; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5in; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l6 level3 lfo1; tab-stops: list 1.0in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Arial Narrow'"><SPAN style="mso-list: Ignore">1.1.6<SPAN style="FONT: 7pt 'Times New Roman'">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </SPAN></SPAN></SPAN><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">Fastest &amp; Exact delivery period/schedule and time required for installation may be indicated.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoNormal style="TEXT-JUSTIFY: inter-ideograph; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 1in; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5in; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l6 level3 lfo1; tab-stops: list 1.0in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Arial Narrow'"><SPAN style="mso-list: Ignore">1.1.7<SPAN style="FONT: 7pt 'Times New Roman'">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </SPAN></SPAN></SPAN><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">Warranty/Guarantee and free AMC/Services being offered, if any.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoNormal style="TEXT-JUSTIFY: inter-ideograph; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 1in; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5in; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l6 level3 lfo1; tab-stops: list 1.0in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Arial Narrow'"><SPAN style="mso-list: Ignore">1.1.8<SPAN style="FONT: 7pt 'Times New Roman'">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </SPAN></SPAN></SPAN><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">Authorization letter for Indian agent, if applicable.<SPAN style="mso-spacerun: yes">&nbsp; </SPAN>Responsibilities/Obligations of Indian Agent may be clarified.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoNormal style="TEXT-JUSTIFY: inter-ideograph; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 1in; TEXT-INDENT: -0.5in; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l6 level3 lfo1; tab-stops: list 1.0in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Arial Narrow'"><SPAN style="mso-list: Ignore">1.1.9<SPAN style="FONT: 7pt 'Times New Roman'">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </SPAN></SPAN></SPAN><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">Any other relevant documents which may help the Institute in rightly assessing the quality of the product (e.g. ISO certification).<o:p></o:p></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoBodyText style="TEXT-JUSTIFY: inter-ideograph; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify"><EM><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 10.0pt">The technical bid will be opened in the presence of authorized representative(s), if any, of the quoting firm(s) on </SPAN><st1:date Month="11" Day="23" Year="2005"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 10.0pt">23 November 2005</SPAN></st1:date><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 10.0pt"> at </SPAN><st1:time Hour="15" Minute="0"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 10.0pt">3.00 pm</SPAN></st1:time><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 10.0pt"> in the Institute.</SPAN><B style="mso-bidi-font-weight: normal"><U><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-style: italic; mso-bidi-font-size: 10.0pt"><o:p></o:p></SPAN></U></B></EM></P></TD></TR>
<TR style="mso-yfti-lastrow: yes">
<TD style="BORDER-RIGHT: windowtext 1pt solid; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt; BORDER-TOP: #d4d0c8; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; BORDER-LEFT: windowtext 1pt solid; WIDTH: 7.45in; PADDING-TOP: 0in; BORDER-BOTTOM: windowtext 1pt solid; BACKGROUND-COLOR: transparent; mso-border-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; mso-border-top-alt: solid windowtext .5pt" vAlign=top width=715>
<P class=MsoNormal style="TEXT-JUSTIFY: inter-ideograph; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify"><B style="mso-bidi-font-weight: normal"><U><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">COMMERCIAL BID SHOULD CONTAIN<o:p></o:p></SPAN></U></B></P>
<P class=MsoNormal style="TEXT-JUSTIFY: inter-ideograph; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">The commercial bid should contain ONLY financial offer with detailed break-up of <B style="mso-bidi-font-weight: normal">(a) F.O.B. Prices, </B>and <B style="mso-bidi-font-weight: normal">(b) C.I.F., Mumbai prices, </B>and, Terms &amp; conditions of offer.<SPAN style="mso-spacerun: yes">&nbsp; </SPAN><B style="mso-bidi-font-weight: normal">Please note:<o:p></o:p></B></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoNormal style="TEXT-JUSTIFY: inter-ideograph; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.75in; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l5 level2 lfo7; tab-stops: list .75in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Arial Narrow'"><SPAN style="mso-list: Ignore">a.<SPAN style="FONT: 7pt 'Times New Roman'">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </SPAN></SPAN></SPAN><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">Commercial bid will be considered only for those offers, whose technical bid is found suitable/acceptable.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoNormal style="TEXT-JUSTIFY: inter-ideograph; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.75in; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l5 level2 lfo7; tab-stops: list .75in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Arial Narrow'"><SPAN style="mso-list: Ignore">b.<SPAN style="FONT: 7pt 'Times New Roman'">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </SPAN></SPAN></SPAN><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">The commercial bid of the short-listed tenderers will be opened at a later date after giving intimation regarding the date and time of opening.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoNormal style="TEXT-JUSTIFY: inter-ideograph; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.75in; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l5 level2 lfo7; tab-stops: list .75in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Arial Narrow'"><SPAN style="mso-list: Ignore">c.<SPAN style="FONT: 7pt 'Times New Roman'">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </SPAN></SPAN></SPAN><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">Certificate to the effect that your offer will be valid for at least 90 days from the date of its opening, may be attached.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoNormal style="TEXT-JUSTIFY: inter-ideograph; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.75in; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l5 level2 lfo7; tab-stops: list .75in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: 'Arial Narrow'"><SPAN style="mso-list: Ignore">d.<SPAN style="FONT: 7pt 'Times New Roman'">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </SPAN></SPAN></SPAN><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">Air Freight (by Air </SPAN><st1:country-region><st1:place><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">India</SPAN></st1:place></st1:country-region><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt"> only) Air Post parcel may be shown. In the event of order being placed, supplier will be required to send the material on Freight pre-paid basis.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoBodyText style="TEXT-JUSTIFY: inter-ideograph; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify"><EM><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 10.0pt">Insurance cover must be taken by the supplier to insure the consignment from all risks - from supplier’s warehouse to the warehouse of CSMCRI, </SPAN><st1:City><st1:place><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 10.0pt">Bhavnagar</SPAN></st1:place></st1:City><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 10.0pt">.</SPAN><B style="mso-bidi-font-weight: normal"><U><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-STYLE: normal; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-style: italic; mso-bidi-font-size: 10.0pt"><o:p></o:p></SPAN></U></B></EM></P></TD></TR></TBODY></TABLE>
<P class=MsoNormal style="TEXT-JUSTIFY: inter-ideograph; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt"><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoNormal style="TEXT-JUSTIFY: inter-ideograph; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">While submitting your quotations please note the following terms and conditions also:<o:p></o:p></SPAN></P>
<H6><FONT face="Arial Narrow" size=3>IMPORTANT</FONT></H6>
<TABLE class=MsoNormalTable style="BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-TOP: medium none; MARGIN: auto auto auto 5.4pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: medium none; BORDER-COLLAPSE: collapse; mso-padding-alt: 0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt; mso-table-layout-alt: fixed; mso-border-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; mso-border-insideh: .5pt solid windowtext; mso-border-insidev: .5pt solid windowtext" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=1>

<TR>
<TD style="BORDER-RIGHT: windowtext 1pt solid; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt; BORDER-TOP: windowtext 1pt solid; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; BORDER-LEFT: windowtext 1pt solid; WIDTH: 87.2pt; PADDING-TOP: 0in; BORDER-BOTTOM: windowtext 1pt solid; BACKGROUND-COLOR: transparent; mso-border-alt: solid windowtext .5pt" vAlign=top width=116>
<P class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">Earnest Money Deposit<o:p></o:p></SPAN></P></TD>
<TD style="BORDER-RIGHT: windowtext 1pt solid; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt; BORDER-TOP: windowtext 1pt solid; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; BORDER-LEFT: #d4d0c8; WIDTH: 443.8pt; PADDING-TOP: 0in; BORDER-BOTTOM: windowtext 1pt solid; BACKGROUND-COLOR: transparent; mso-border-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; mso-border-left-alt: solid windowtext .5pt" vAlign=top width=592>
<P class=MsoNormal style="TEXT-JUSTIFY: inter-ideograph; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">The quotation should be accompanied by an <B style="mso-bidi-font-weight: normal"><SPAN style="COLOR: red">Earnest Money Deposit of Rs.4 Lakhs (Rupees Four lakhs only)</SPAN></B> or equivalent foreign currency in the form of Demand Draft in favour of <I style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal">Director, Central Salt &amp; Marine Chemicals Research Institute, </I></SPAN><st1:City><st1:place><I style="mso-bidi-font-style: normal"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">Bhavnagar</SPAN></I></st1:place></st1:City><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt"> payable at any Nationalized Banks in </SPAN><st1:City><st1:place><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">Bhavnagar</SPAN></st1:place></st1:City><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt"> (</SPAN><st1:place><st1:City><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">Gujarat</SPAN></st1:City><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">, </SPAN><st1:country-region><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">India</SPAN></st1:country-region></st1:place><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">). (Attach with Technical Bid). The EMD will be returned to unsuccessful bidders after finalization of the purchase.<SPAN style="mso-spacerun: yes">&nbsp; </SPAN>Tenderers, if they so desire, can also provide Bank Guarantee (in lieu of DD) as per the proforma enclosed (Annexure-B) – valid for a period of 90 days from the date of opening of the quotation.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></P></TD></TR>
<TR style="mso-yfti-lastrow: yes">
<TD style="BORDER-RIGHT: windowtext 1pt solid; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt; BORDER-TOP: #d4d0c8; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; BORDER-LEFT: windowtext 1pt solid; WIDTH: 87.2pt; PADDING-TOP: 0in; BORDER-BOTTOM: windowtext 1pt solid; BACKGROUND-COLOR: transparent; mso-border-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; mso-border-top-alt: solid windowtext .5pt" vAlign=top width=116>
<P class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">Security Deposit/ Performance Bank Guarantee<o:p></o:p></SPAN></P></TD>
<TD style="BORDER-RIGHT: windowtext 1pt solid; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt; BORDER-TOP: #d4d0c8; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; BORDER-LEFT: #d4d0c8; WIDTH: 443.8pt; PADDING-TOP: 0in; BORDER-BOTTOM: windowtext 1pt solid; BACKGROUND-COLOR: transparent; mso-border-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; mso-border-left-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; mso-border-top-alt: solid windowtext .5pt" vAlign=top width=592>
<P class=MsoNormal style="TEXT-JUSTIFY: inter-ideograph; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">The successful bidders, at the time of acceptance of the order, are required to execute a Performance Bank Guarantee of 10% of the value of the order, to cover warranty obligations, which should be valid upto 2 months beyond expiry of warranty period. Penalty, equivalent to 1% of the ordered value, will be levied in case the successful bidder fails to supply/install the ordered item within accepted delivery/installation period.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></P></TD></TR></TBODY></TABLE>
<P class=MsoNormal style="TEXT-JUSTIFY: inter-ideograph; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt"><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></SPAN></P>
<H6><FONT face="Arial Narrow" size=3>GENERAL</FONT></H6>
<TABLE class=MsoNormalTable style="BORDER-RIGHT: medium none; BORDER-TOP: medium none; MARGIN: auto auto auto 5.4pt; BORDER-LEFT: medium none; BORDER-BOTTOM: medium none; BORDER-COLLAPSE: collapse; mso-padding-alt: 0in 5.4pt 0in 5.4pt; mso-table-layout-alt: fixed; mso-border-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; mso-border-insideh: .5pt solid windowtext; mso-border-insidev: .5pt solid windowtext" cellSpacing=0 cellPadding=0 border=1>
<TBODY>
<TR style="HEIGHT: 62.5pt; page-break-inside: avoid">
<TD style="BORDER-RIGHT: windowtext 1pt solid; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt; BORDER-TOP: windowtext 1pt solid; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; BORDER-LEFT: windowtext 1pt solid; WIDTH: 87.2pt; PADDING-TOP: 0in; BORDER-BOTTOM: windowtext 1pt solid; HEIGHT: 62.5pt; BACKGROUND-COLOR: transparent; mso-border-alt: solid windowtext .5pt" vAlign=top width=116>
<P class=MsoHeader style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; tab-stops: .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">Offer from Principal/Indian Agent<o:p></o:p></SPAN></P></TD>
<TD style="BORDER-RIGHT: windowtext 1pt solid; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt; BORDER-TOP: windowtext 1pt solid; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; BORDER-LEFT: #d4d0c8; WIDTH: 443.8pt; PADDING-TOP: 0in; BORDER-BOTTOM: windowtext 1pt solid; HEIGHT: 62.5pt; BACKGROUND-COLOR: transparent; mso-border-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; mso-border-left-alt: solid windowtext .5pt" vAlign=top width=592>
<P class=MsoNormal style="TEXT-JUSTIFY: inter-ideograph; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">Generally, offers are expected from original manufacturers of the item, directly. The Indian agents who are submitting their bids directly must enclose an authorization from their principals.<SPAN style="mso-spacerun: yes">&nbsp; </SPAN>As per Government of India regulations, all Indian agents who are representing foreign firms should get themselves established with DGS&amp;D.<SPAN style="mso-spacerun: yes">&nbsp; </SPAN>Indian agents quoting on behalf of their principals must ensure quoting DGS&amp;D Registration No. in their offer.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></P></TD></TR>
<TR>

<TD style="BORDER-RIGHT: windowtext 1pt solid; PADDING-RIGHT: 5.4pt; BORDER-TOP: #d4d0c8; PADDING-LEFT: 5.4pt; PADDING-BOTTOM: 0in; BORDER-LEFT: #d4d0c8; WIDTH: 443.8pt; PADDING-TOP: 0in; BORDER-BOTTOM: windowtext 1pt solid; BACKGROUND-COLOR: transparent; mso-border-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; mso-border-left-alt: solid windowtext .5pt; mso-border-top-alt: solid windowtext .5pt" vAlign=top width=592>
<P class=MsoNormal style="TEXT-JUSTIFY: inter-ideograph; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo5; tab-stops: list .25in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: Wingdings; mso-fareast-font-family: Wingdings; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: Wingdings"><SPAN style="mso-list: Ignore">v<SPAN style="FONT: 7pt 'Times New Roman'">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </SPAN></SPAN></SPAN><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">The warranty period and free service facilities after expiry of warranty should be clearly indicated.<SPAN style="mso-spacerun: yes">&nbsp; </SPAN>Detail of service being offered during Warranty period may be indicated.<SPAN style="mso-spacerun: yes">&nbsp; </SPAN>Quotation of bidders who offer maximum warranty and give an undertaking that they will provide stand-by item in the event of any defect noticed during the warranty period, will have a bearing while short-listing the technical bids.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoNormal style="TEXT-JUSTIFY: inter-ideograph; MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt 0.25in; TEXT-INDENT: -0.25in; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo5; tab-stops: list .25in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: Wingdings; mso-fareast-font-family: Wingdings; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt; mso-bidi-font-family: Wingdings"><SPAN style="mso-list: Ignore">v<SPAN style="FONT: 7pt 'Times New Roman'">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </SPAN></SPAN></SPAN><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Arial Narrow'; mso-bidi-font-size: 12.0pt">The successful bidders, at the time of acceptance of the order, are required to execute a Performance Bank Guarantee of 10% of the value of the order, to cover warranty obligations, which should be valid upto 2 months beyond expiry of warranty period. <o:p></o:p></SPAN></P></TD></TR>
<TR style="page-break-inside: avoid">

<P class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: right; tab-stops: 270.0pt" align=right><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 12pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman'; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-fareast-language: EN-US; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-bidi-language: AR-SA"><SPAN style="mso-spacerun: yes">&nbsp;</SPAN></SPAN><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman'; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-fareast-language: EN-US; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-bidi-language: AR-SA">Executive Engineer (civil.)<SPAN style="mso-spacerun: yes">&nbsp; </SPAN></SPAN></P> 2005-11-24 11:48:20
5 1/05-06 2005-12-09 2005-12-27 13:00:00 Contract for providing unskilled labourers (civilians) for cleaning, sweeping and gardening <SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">
<P class=MsoBodyText style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">Competitive sealed tenders are invited from financially sound parties in the prescribed format by the Director, CSMCRI, Bhavnagar for awarding contract for providing unskilled labourers (civilians) for cleaning, sweeping and gardening of the premises of CSMCRI and its Experimental Salt Farm, Kumbharwada, Bhavnagar for a period of one year with effect from 1.1.2006 as per laid down Contractual conditions.</SPAN></P><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">
<H6 style="TEXT-ALIGN: justify"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt"><U>Personnel required to be supplied<?xml:namespace prefix = o ns = "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office" /><o:p></o:p></U></SPAN></H6>
<P class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify"><o:p><FONT size=3>&nbsp;</FONT></o:p><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">Safaiwalas<SPAN style="mso-tab-count: 2">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </SPAN>10 (Ten)<SPAN style="mso-tab-count: 1">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </SPAN><o:p></o:p></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify"><?xml:namespace prefix = st1 ns = "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:smarttags" /><st1:place w:st="on"><st1:country-region w:st="on"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">Malis</SPAN></st1:country-region></st1:place><SPAN style="mso-tab-count: 3"><FONT size=3>&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </FONT></SPAN><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">08 (Eight)<SPAN style="mso-tab-count: 1">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </SPAN><o:p></o:p></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">These figures are tentative. They may increase or decrease from time to time.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoBodyText style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><o:p></o:p></SPAN>&nbsp;</P></SPAN>
<P class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-INDENT: 0.25in; TEXT-ALIGN: justify"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">The Contractor should fulfill the following requirements: <o:p></o:p></SPAN></P>
<OL style="MARGIN-TOP: 0in" type=1>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">The Contractor must have minimum one year experience in providing such services to Govt./Semi Govt. or well-known private organizations and must produce documentary evidence to this effect.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">The Contractor should have registered with Regional Labour Commissioner (Central).<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">Registration Certificate from EPF/ESI/Service Tax authorities.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">The Contractor must have a local office/representative for ensuring satisfactory fulfillment of contractual obligations.</SPAN></LI></OL><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">
<P class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">Director, CSMCRI reserves the right to accept or reject any tender bid without assigning any reasons whatsoever and his decision will be final and binding on all the parties. Tender documents of contractors not producing proof of possessing item No.2&amp;3 will be summarily rejected.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt"><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">The contractor shall execute an agreement on a stamp paper of required value for due performance of the contract within a week. He will provide a sum equal to one month wages and statutory payments as Security Deposit (Approx. Rs.75,000/-).<o:p></o:p></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt"><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">Tender papers alongwith terms &amp; conditions, duly completed may be submitted in a sealed cover, superscribed <U>Tender for Conservancy</U>, addressed to the Director, Central Salt &amp; Marine Chemicals Research Institute, G.B.Marg, Bhavnagar-364002 upto 1.00 PM on <U>27.12.05</U> alongwith a <U>tender paper fee of Rs.500/- (non-refundable) and Rs.25,000/- towards EMD in form of a D.D. in favour of Director, CSMCRI, Bhavnagar. Both the amounts i.e. Rs.500/- and Rs.25,000/- should be paid through separate DD’s and placed in the sealed cover containing the tender. The tenders will be opened on 27.12.05 at 3.00 PM.</U> <o:p></o:p></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">Institute will not be responsible for any postal delays etc.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt"><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"><B><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">*Tenders quoting below the minimum wages and statutory payments will be summarily rejected.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></B></P>
<P class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify"><o:p><FONT size=3>&nbsp;</FONT></o:p></P>
<P class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">Before submitting your tender please go through all the terms and conditions on which the work will be awarded and to be executed by the successful tenderer. <o:p></o:p></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt"><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">You will be required to enclose the following documents along with your tender documents :<o:p></o:p></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt"><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></SPAN></P>
<OL style="MARGIN-TOP: 0in" type=1>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">Tender Paper Fee of Rs.500/- (Non-refundable).<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">EMD for Rs.25,000/-.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">Experience proof of all works done by you.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">Registration Certificate from EPF/ESI/Service Tax authorities.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI></OL>
<P class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt"><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt"><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt"><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: 'Times New Roman'; mso-fareast-font-family: 'Times New Roman'; mso-fareast-language: EN-US; mso-ansi-language: EN-US; mso-bidi-language: AR-SA"><SPAN style="mso-tab-count: 8">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; </SPAN>Controller of Administration</SPAN><o:p></o:p></SPAN></P> <P class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">Terms and Conditions for award of contract for providing unskilled labourers (Civilians) for cleaning, sweeping the gardening of the premises of CSMCRI and its Experimental Salt Farm, Kumbharwada, <?xml:namespace prefix = st1 ns = "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:smarttags" /><st1:place w:st="on"><st1:City w:st="on">Bhavnagar</st1:City></st1:place>.<?xml:namespace prefix = o ns = "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office" /><o:p></o:p></SPAN></P>
<P class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt"><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></SPAN></P>
<OL style="MARGIN-TOP: 0in" type=1>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">On award of Contract, the Contractor shall obtain the necessary license under the Contract Labour (Regulation and Abolition) Act, 1970 within a month, at his own cost and comply with the provisions of the act and the rules made there under by the Government from time to time.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">The persons deployed by the contractor for the services mentioned above shall be the employees of the contractor for all intents and purposes and that the persons so deployed shall remain under the control and supervision of the contractor and in no case, shall a relationship of employer and employee between the said persons and the CSIR shall accrue/arise implicitly or explicitly.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">That on taking over the responsibility of the work assigned the contractor shall formulate the mechanism and duty assignment of House keeping and cleaning personnel in consultation with Director of the Institute or his nominee. Subsequently, the contractor shall review the house keeping and cleaning arrangement from time to time and advise the Director of the Institute for further streamlining their system. The contractor shall further be bound by and carry out the directions/instructions given to him by the Director of the Institute or the officer designated by the Director in this respect from time to time.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">That the Director of the Institute or any other persons authorized by the Director shall be at liberty to carry out surprise check on the persons as deployed by the contractor in order to ensure that persons deployed by him are doing their duties.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">That in case any of the persons so deployed by the contractor does not come upto the mark or does not perform his duties properly or commits misconduct or indulges in any unlawful riots or disorderly conduct, the contractor shall immediately withdraw and take suitable action against such persons on the report of the Institute/CSIR in this respect. Further the contractor shall immediately replace the particular person so deployed on the demand of the Director of the Institute or his nominee/CSIR in case any of the aforesaid acts on the part of the said person.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">That the contractor shall carefully and diligently perform the work of house keeping and cleaning arrangement of the building/premises in consultation with the Institute.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">That for performing the assigned work, the contractor shall deploy medically and physically fit persons. The contractor shall ensure that the persons are punctual and disciplined and remain vigilant in performance of their duty. <o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">That the contractor shall submit details such as, names, parentage, residential address, age, etc. of the persons deployed by him in the premises of the CSMCRI/CSIR. For the purpose of proper identification of the employees of the contractor deployed for the work, he shall issue identity cards bearing their photographs/identification etc. and such employees shall display their identity cards at the time of duty.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">That the contractor shall be liable for payment of wages and all other dues which they are entitled to received under the various labour laws and other statutory provisions. <o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">That the contractor shall at his own cost, if required, take necessary insurance cover in respect of the aforesaid services rendered to CSMCRI/CSIR and shall comply with the statutory provisions of Contract Labour (Regulation &amp; Abolition) Act, 1970; Employees State Insurance Act; Workman’s Compensation Act, 1923; Payment of Wages Act, 1936; The Employees Provident Fund and miscellaneous provisions Act, 1952; The Payment of Bonus Act, 1965; The Minimum Wages Act, 1948; Employer’s Liability Act, 1938; Employment of Children Act, 1938, Maternity Benefit Act and/or any other rules/regulations and/or statutes that may be applicable to them. <o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">That the contractor shall be solely responsible for any violation of provision of the labour laws or any other statutory provisions and shall further keep the CSIR indemnified from all acts of omission, fault, breaches, and/or any claim, demand, loss, injury and expense arising out from the non compliance of the aforesaid statutory provision. Contractor’s failure to fulfill any of the obligations hereunder and/or under the said Acts, rules/regulations and/or any bye-laws or rules framed under or any of these the CSIR/CSMCRI shall be entitled to recover any of the such losses or expenses which it may have to suffer or incur on account of such claims, demands, loss or injury from the contractor’s monthly payments.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">That the contractor shall be required to maintain permanent attendance register/roll within the building premises which will be open for inspection and checking by the authorized officers of CSMCRI/CSIR.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">That the contractor shall make the payment of wages, etc. to the persons so deployed in the presence of representative of the CSMCRI/CSIR and shall on demand furnish copies of wages register/muster roll, etc. to the Institute for having paid all the dues to the persons deployed by him. This obligation is imposed on the contractor to ensure that he is fulfilling his commitments towards his employees so deployed under various Labour Laws, having regard to the duties of CSMCRI/CSIR in this respect as per the provisions of Contract Labour (Regulation and Abolition) Act, 1970. The contractor shall comply with or cause to be complied with the Labour regulations from time to time in regard to payment of wages, wage period deductions from wages, recovery of wages not paid and deductions unauthorisedly made, maintenance of wage book, wage slip, publications of scale of wages and terms of employment, inspection and submission of periodical returns.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">That the contractor shall submit the proof of having deposited the amount of contribution claimed by him on account of ESI &amp; EPF towards the persons deployed at CSIR Lab./Institute buildings in their respective names before submitting the bill for the subsequent month. In case the contractor fails to do so, the amount towards ESI &amp; EPF contribution will be withheld till submission of required documents.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">The contractor shall take all reasonable precautions to prevent any unlawful riot or disorderly conduct or acts of his employees so deployed and ensure preservation of peace and protection of persons and property of CSMCRI/CSIR.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">That the contractor shall deploy his persons in such a way that they get weekly rest. The working hours/leave for which the work is taken from them, do not violate relevant provisions of Shops and Establishment Act. The contractor shall in all dealings with the persons in his employment have due regard to all recognized festivals, days of rest and religious or other customs. In the event of the contractor committing a default or breach of any of the provisions of the Labour Laws including the provisions of Contract Labour (Regulation and Abolition) Act, 1970 as amended from time to time or furnishing any information, or submitting or filling any statement under the provisions of the said regulations and rules which is materially incorrect, they shall without prejudice to any other liability pay to the Director of the Institute a sum as may be claimed by the CSMCRI/CSIR.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">The contractor shall remove all workers deployed by him on termination of the contract or on expiry of the contract from the premises of the Institute and ensure that no such person shall create any disruption/hindrance/problem of any nature in the Institute either explicitly or implicitly.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">The security money so deposited shall be liable to be forfeited or appropriated in the event of unsatisfactory performance of the contractor and/or loss/damage if any sustained by the Institute on account of the failure or negligence of the workers deployed by him or in the event of breach of the agreement by the contractor.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">The security will be refunded to the contractor within one month of the expiry of the contract only on the satisfactory performance of the contract.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">That the contractor shall keep the CSMCRI/CSIR indemnified against all claims whatsoever in respect of the employees deployed by the contractor. In case any employee of the contractor so deployed enters in dispute of any nature whatsoever, it will be the primary responsibility of the contractor to contest the same. In case CSMCRI/CSIR is made party and is supposed to contest the case, the CSMCRI/CSIR will be reimbursed for the actual expenses incurred towards Counsel fee and other expenses which shall be paid in advance by the contractor to CSMCRI/CSIR on demand. Further, the contractor shall ensure that no financial or any other liability comes on CSMCRI/CSIR in this respect of any nature whatsoever and shall keep CSMCRI/CSIR indemnified in this respect.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">The contractor shall further keep the CSMCRI/CSIR indemnified against any loss to the CSMCRI/CSIR property and assets. The CSMCRI/CSIR shall have further right to adjust and/or deduct any of the amounts as aforesaid from the payments due to the contractor under this contract.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">The contractor shall get the antecedents of his personnel verified through Police channels and the verification reports made available to CSMCRI/CSIR.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">That if any damage is caused to the property of the Institute due to negligence of personnel deployed by him the cost of such damage shall be recovered from the bill(s).<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">The contractor is required to supply any additional staff that may be requisitioned from time to time by CSMCRI/CSIR at the accepted rates as well as on the accepted terms and conditions.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI></OL>
<P class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt"><o:p>&nbsp;</o:p></SPAN></P>
<OL style="MARGIN-TOP: 0in" type=1 start=25>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">That payment on account of enhancement/escalation charges on account of revision in wages by the appropriate Govt. from time to time shall be payable by the CSMCRI/CSIR to the contractor.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">That the CSMCRI/CSIR shall reimburse the amount of service tax, if any, paid by the contractor to the authorities on account of the services rendered by him. This reimbursement shall be admissible on production of proof of deposit of the same by the contractor. As regards Bonus, the same will be reimbursed on production of documentary proof for having paid Bonus.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">During the period of agreement the contract may be terminated by the Director, CSMCRI, <st1:City w:st="on"><st1:place w:st="on">Bhavnagar</st1:place></st1:City> by giving one calendar month’s notice or on payment of one month’s charges in lieu thereof.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">In the event of any question, dispute/difference arising under the agreement or in connection herewith (except as to matters the decision of which is specially provided under the agreement) the same shall be referred to the sole arbitration to DGCSIR or his nominee.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">The award of the arbitrator shall be final and binding on the parties. In the event of such arbitrator to whom the matter is originally referred is being transferred or vacating his office or resigning or refusing to work or neglecting his work or being unable to act for any reason whatsoever, the Director-General, CSIR shall appoint another person to act as arbitrator in place of the out-going arbitrator in accordance with the terms of the agreement and the persons so appointed shall be entitled to proceed with the reference from the stage at which it was left by his predecessor.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">The Arbitrator may give interim award’s and/or directions, as may be required.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">Subject to the aforesaid provisions the Arbitrator &amp; Condition Act, 1996 and the rules made hereunder and any modification thereof from time to time being in force shall be deemed to apply to the arbitration proceedings under this clause.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">The contractor shall execute an agreement on a stamp paper of required value for due performance of the contract within a week. He will provide a sum equal to one month wages and statutory payments as Security Deposit.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">The tenders should be accompanied by the Earnest Money Deposit amount of Rs.25,000/- (Rupees Twenty five thousand only) by means of a Demand Draft drawn in favour of Director, CSMCRI, Bhavnagar and no other mode of payment is acceptable.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">The Earnest Money Deposit amount of Rs.25,000/- is liable to be forfeited and LOI shall be treated as cancelled, if the contractor(s) selected for the work fails to sign the formal agreement within a week from the date of information about their tender being accepted or otherwise fails to start work within a week from the date of order to commence the work<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">The contractor shall not charge any amount to the personnel deployed by him towards recruitment fee.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">Contractor has to deposit the ESI &amp; EPF contribution locally in <st1:City w:st="on">Bhavnagar</st1:City> only and he has to ensure that all the employees have been given ESI Card &amp; EPF Card immediately and employees are getting treatment in <st1:place w:st="on"><st1:PlaceName w:st="on">ESI</st1:PlaceName> <st1:PlaceType w:st="on">Hospital</st1:PlaceType></st1:place> as and when required.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l1 level1 lfo1; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">The Contractor is required to undertake the following works:<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI></OL>
<OL style="MARGIN-TOP: 0in" type=1>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo2; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">Cleaning the entire premises of the Institute including roads &amp; corridors, Guest Houses, ESF and Pot Culture House.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo2; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">Cleaning of all bathrooms &amp; W.C’s westerns as well as Indian.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo2; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">Mopping of all floors, cleaning &amp; removing cobweb and spider nets.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo2; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">The above cleaning operations are required to be undertaken manually or with machines as per requirement.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo2; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">All operations for upkeep of Garden including new plantations etc.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI>
<LI class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt; TEXT-ALIGN: justify; mso-list: l0 level1 lfo2; tab-stops: list .5in"><SPAN style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt">Any other work related to above types of works as assigned by the Principal Employer from time to time.<o:p></o:p></SPAN></LI></OL> 2005-12-09 19:09:49
